# NEOhio Property Management

> Professional property management services for landlords and real estate investors in Northeast Ohio. We manage single-family homes, multi-family properties, and rental portfolios across Cleveland, Akron, Lorain, Elyria, Medina, and surrounding areas.

## Business Information

- Name: NEOhio Property Management
- Type: Property Management Company
- Website: https://neohiorent.com
- Service Region: Northeast Ohio

## Services

### Full-Service Property Management
Complete property management solutions for landlords including tenant screening, rent collection, maintenance coordination, and legal compliance.

### Tenant Placement
Professional tenant screening and placement services to find quality renters for your properties.

### Maintenance Coordination
24/7 maintenance coordination with trusted local contractors to keep your properties in top condition.

### Financial Reporting
Clear monthly statements and annual reporting for your rental property investments.

## Service Areas

- Cleveland, Ohio
- Akron, Ohio
- Lorain, Ohio
- Elyria, Ohio
- Medina, Ohio
- Sandusky, Ohio
- And all of Northeast Ohio

## Why Cleveland for Rental Investment

Cleveland, Ohio ranks as the #1 rental cash flow market in America for 2026 with:
- Price-to-rent ratio of 11.0 (best in class)
- Average property prices around $145,000
- 8-12% cash-on-cash returns
- Strong rental demand from major employers like Cleveland Clinic, University Hospitals, and Case Western Reserve University
